metadata.name: Basic Body Regions
metadata.description: Body region hierarchy using common terminology for body measurements and avatar creation
metadata.purpose: Standardized body regions for landmarks, points of measure, and digital avatar systems

Head.description: The uppermost part of the body including all facial features and scalp

Face.description: The front portion of the head from hairline to chin

Forehead.description: Area between the hairline and eyebrows

Eyes.description: Region around the eyes including eyebrows and under-eye area

Cheeks.description: The sides of the face from eyes to jaw

Chin.description: The bottom portion of the face below the mouth

Scalp.description: The top and back of the head typically covered by hair

Ear.description: The external ear structure on the side of the head

Neck.description: The region connecting the head to the shoulders and trunk

Upper Body.description: The trunk and arm from shoulder to waist

Chest.description: The front upper trunk from neck to bottom of ribcage

Back.description: The posterior trunk from shoulders to waist

Abdomen.description: The front trunk below the chest and above the hips

Waist.description: The narrowest part of the trunk

Arm.description: The upper limb from shoulder to fingertips

Shoulder.description: Where the arm connects to the trunk

Elbow.description: The joint between upper arm and forearm

Wrist.description: The joint connecting forearm to hand

Hip.description: The pelvic region at widest point

Groin.description: The junction area where the legs meet the trunk

Leg.description: The lower limb from hip to toes

Thigh.description: Upper portion of leg from hip to knee

Knee.description: The joint between thigh and lower leg

Ankle.description: The joint connecting leg to foot

Foot.description: The terminal part of the leg
